title: Salem Maritime National Historic Site: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       Follow the latest news and developments at Salem Maritime National Historic Site using the links to the left and below. Subscribe to News & Events Automatically get the latest news, event information and special announcements delivered via email by subscribing to our mailing list. We don't spam and you can unsubscribe anytime. Subscribe here.  Facebook "Like" Salem Maritime National Historic Site on Facebook to get a first look at upcoming events, programs, and news. Twitter Follow @SalemMaritimeNPS on Twitter and receive updates on breaking news in the park, social events, and "what is happening now".
